MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA19 postcode area of Culzean and Maybole. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00AM due to repairs required to a broken piece of equipment on our overhead line network at Whitestone Dunure substation. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.56AM on 31 October 2020.
